title: Success metrics before migration
summary: Define how you will measure platform success before building the platform.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Without agreed metrics, teams optimize locally (speed, cost, uptime) and conflict later.
whenNotToUse: You are running a short-lived prototype with no intent to scale

gotchas: Measuring only SLA breaches misses early-warning signals
thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Measure: change lead time, deployment frequency, error rate, backlog depth/lag, and cost per workload.

complexity.skillDemand: SRE/observability literacy plus program governance skill.

realWorldExample.approach: Established baseline and agreed thresholds for the POV.
realWorldExample.outcome: Clear evidence of progress and fewer opinion fights.
